body: Just a heads up - there is only one game of Walls going.  The other two games that look like they are going will not end, some glitch with the map.
body_tagged: Just a heads up - there is only one game of Walls going.  The other two games that look like they are going will not end, some glitch with the map.
title: Walls:  Two of three games are glitched out

replies.body: Fixed, thanks for reporting this issue!
replies.body_tagged: Fixed, thanks for reporting this issue!

replies.body: Thanks, with three games going the wait time is not long.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, with three games going the wait time is not long.

replies.body:
Same thing, but now three of five games are glitched out.  If you could please reset them...

Thanks!

edit:  it's fixed, thanks again!

replies.body: Same thing, Walls04 is frozen on Knight's Castle.
replies.body_tagged: Same thing, Walls04 is frozen on Knight's Castle.

replies.body:
^ thanks for fixing that one.

Walls01 is now hung up on Blue Cove, please reset when you get the chance.

Is there a better way to report locked up servers?
replies.body_tagged:
^ thanks for fixing that one.

replies.body: Just post these issues on http://www.github.com/avicus/issues.
replies.body_tagged: Just post these issues on http://www.github.com/avicus/issues.

replies.body:
That would take too long, I am trying to figure out how to let a mod know right away without having to figure out who is a mod or not.

By the way, another map is glitched out, and there are only three total so only two working maps.

It is now fixed, thanks!
